title: Baby in Her Arms
description: HAVE BABY, NEED WIFEWhen Josh McKinley appeared on Maggie O'Connor's doorstep with a baby in his arms and an irresistibly helpless expression on his face, Maggie's maternal--and womanly--smarts wouldn't let her turn him away. But that one good deed soon turned into marriage--in name only--and Maggie knew she was in way over her head. Because what started out as a practical union was fast turning into a passion-filled romance....The Lucky Charm Sisters: A boss, a brain and a beauty. Three sisters marry for convenience...but will they find love?
author: Judy Christenberry
